## ClickTextOptions interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ClickTextOptions extends TimeoutOptions, RetryOptions, CheckEveryOption 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [TimeoutOptions](./pentf.timeoutoptions.md)<!-- -->, [RetryOptions](./pentf.retryoptions.md)<!-- -->, [CheckEveryOption](./pentf.checkeveryoption.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [elementXPath?](./pentf.clicktextoptions.elementxpath.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> XPath selector for the elements to match. By default matching <code>a</code>, <code>button</code>, <code>input</code>, <code>label</code>. <code>'//*'</code> to match any element. |
|  [extraMessage?](./pentf.clicktextoptions.extramessage.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional error message shown if the element is not visible in time. |
